snippet.title: Kingdom Hearts II (PS2) Gameplay
snippet.description:
Alternate title: "Let's Spam The Hell Outta Reaction Commands & Watch Some Boring Cutscenes"

(KHII in a nutshell, am i right, guys?) :P


Looking back at this, the whole 1000-Heartless Battle wasn't really that big a deal; they shouldn't have taken out the Behemoths and Wyverns. This battle can be way more interesting if you do it without reaction commands. Sure, it takes longer, but it's a bit more challenging that way.
